item.title: Hello world
item.description: First of all, let’s try some latex: $\frac{4}{5}$ Now, I will try to use Python. Let’s start with simple hello world print("hello world") hello world Finally, try some matplotlib thing import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as np %matplotlib inline x = np.linspace(0, 3*np.pi, 500) plt.plot(x, np.sin(x**2)) plt.title('A simple chirp') plt.show()

item.title: About This Blog
item.description: Hi, my name is Go Frendi Gunawan. Currently I work as Backend Engineer at kata.ai. In this blog, you will find some articles related to software engineering, machine learning, and mathematics. The articles are intended for mere mortal. Some basic programming/high school math are going to help, but are not required.
